exceptions.exn: In environment X, Y : Type c : (nat -> nat) -> nat -> X -> list Y lc : X -> nat Hc : forall (f : nat -> nat) (n : nat) (x : X), length (c f n x) = lc x P : nat * list X i, err : nat The term "i" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "X".

original: rewrite <- (Hc linker (length (snd P)) i). unfold linker. rewrite list_assoc_equiv. simpl. rewrite Nat.eq_dec_refl. reflexivity.
